title: Fix active season filtering across admin UI
description: Multiple admin views were showing data from all seasons, causing duplicate entries and confusing displays. Add consistent active season filtering to the dashboard, fixtures, teams, players, and season setup pages.
acceptance_criteria: Dashboard teams count filtered by active season
Fixtures page shows no duplicate divisions or teams
Team dropdowns on Create New Fixture modal filtered by division
Teams page groups teams by season with section headings
Season setup page uses compact single-line team rows
Players page filters teams and divisions by active season
testing_requirements: Verify no duplicate entries on any admin page
Verify team dropdowns show correct teams per division
Verify dashboard counts match active season only
Verify players page only shows active season teams

context.user_story: As an admin, I want all views to show data for the current season only so I don't see confusing duplicates from past seasons
